description:
- Corrected notation of some rhythms
- Added harmonies on vocal track for the first two verses
- Incomplete corrections to bass and drum tracks. The drum track his horribly inaccurate currently.
title: A National Acrobat

description:
- Removed 2nd guitar part
- Removed parts where the lead guitar track (originally guitar 3) played where unnecessary
- Made the 3rd note in the 1st measure of the main riff shorter
- Changed rhythm of slide from 9 to 7 in main riff
- Changed the end of the 2nd measure of the main riff to be a triplet
- Separated 1st and 2nd verses
- Added the root to the E5 chord at the beginning of the first two lines of the 1st and 2nd verses
- Added chord markers
- Fixed some rhythm errors in the vocals 
- Added lyrics
- Added hammer ons in the riff for the 2nd section of the song and where needed in measures 125 and 126
- Removed the harmonic at the end of the 2nd measure of the 2nd riff
- Added 2nd strum of chords during 1st and 2nd verses
- Fixed errors in the guitar solo
- Corrected the chords during the outro solo (measures 97-104)
- Made corrections to the bass track in measures 89-96
- Added 2nd guitar part in measures 89-96
- Corrected outro solo (measures 97-104)
title: A National Acrobat
